sentences.english: Calcareous sand is a kind of easily crushed granular materials.
sentences.chinese: 鈣質砂是一種易破碎粒狀材料。

sentences.english: Green leafy vegetables, like broccoli and Chinese cabbage, are also calcium-rich.
sentences.chinese: 綠葉蔬菜，如花椰菜和大白菜，也都富含鈣質。

sentences.english: Foods rich in calcium include milk, cheese and yoghourt.
sentences.chinese: 含豐富鈣質食物包括牛奶，奶酪和酸奶。

sentences.english: Medicines called bisphosphonates are an option to bring down calcium levels.
sentences.chinese: 雙磷酸鹽可用來降低鈣質含量。

sentences.english: Rich in calcium, Casein helps contribute to milk's white color.
sentences.chinese: 富含鈣質的乾酪素對牛奶呈現白色起到一定作用。

sentences.english: Give not a shred of extra calcium to the gestating bitch .
sentences.chinese: 所以請不要給孕期的母犬補充額外的鈣質。

sentences.english: The detection of coronary artery calcinosis increased with aging.
sentences.chinese: 冠狀動脈鈣質沉着隨着年齡的增長而增加。

sentences.english: The calcareous skeletons of this distinctive species have weathered out from the limestone matrix.
sentences.chinese: 這一獨特物種的鈣質骨骼已在石灰石矩陣中風化。

sentences.english: Imitate the calcium-consuming habits of Masai women.
sentences.chinese: 那就學學馬賽婦女們攝取鈣質的習慣吧。

sentences.english: Calcareous siltstone is the main host rock of micro fine disseminated gold deposit(MDGD).
sentences.chinese: 微細浸染型金礦賦礦岩石以鈣質粉砂岩爲主。

sentences.english: I'm so poor I don't even have calcium deposits!
sentences.chinese: 我真可憐，我甚至連個鈣質的驅殼都沒有。

sentences.english: Provision of a cuttlefish bone, which can be gnawed if desired, is also recommended.
sentences.chinese: 如果牠們願意咬墨魚骨，也建議給予牠們來增加鈣質。

sentences.english: Therefore, drinking too much milk can result in3 a net loss of calcium from our bones.
sentences.chinese: 因此，飲用過量牛奶可能會導致骨骼中鈣質的淨流失。

sentences.english: Conclusion CT is very significant in the diagnosis of coronary artery calcinosis.
sentences.chinese: 結論CT對冠狀動脈鈣質沉着的診斷很有價值。

sentences.english: Results 16 cases were with different degrees of intracephalic calcinosis in primary hypoparathyroidism.
sentences.chinese: 結果16例患者有不同程度的腦內鈣質沉着。

sentences.english: Your kidneys respond by pulling calcium from bones to neutralize your blood.
sentences.chinese: 腎臟的反應是從骨頭裏面抽出鈣質來中和血液。
